casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Porter, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Porter (1994), 70 Ohio St.3d 644.]

(No. 94-865 Submitted August 17, 1994 Decided November 9, 1994.) *645 Paul Porter, pro se. Per Curiam.

The decision of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated by the court of appeals.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents.
